|brand = AirTight Networks |model = SS-300-AT |submodelappend = yes |submodel = C-50 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, sensor |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TOR-SS300ATC50 |icid = 8252A-SS300ATC50 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 323D180013T7 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9132; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL128EHT2I-90G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6AB160TSA-5G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Vitesse;VSC8601XKN; |eth3chip = Vitesse;VSC8601XKN; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:74 |oui = 00:11:74
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Redboot;Non-certified release;version UNKNOWN; |stockos = Linux;2.6.15;LSDK-7.3.0.435;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type A) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pad header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = external antennas, PoE in |addchip = RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Silicon;Si4472DY;;1;,,, 2A 23V 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2361;;1;,,, 3A 28V 925kHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2372;;2;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1;,,, 1.5A Ultra Low-Dropout Linear Regulator;Richtek;RT9183;;1;,,, 1-Channel Transistor Output Optocoupler;Lite-On;LTV-357T;;1;,,, 400V Glass Passivated Bridge Rectifier;Multicomp Pro;DB104S;;2;,,, 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device w/ Integrated DC-DC Controller;Akros Silicon;AS1135;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- WP731AP --> |manuf_rev = <!-- V03 --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 09/30/2017 |fccapprovdate = 10/04/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9132 [[MIPS 24K]] (@400MHz) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) DDR *Storage: 16MB Parallel NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9132/AR9106 (802.11abgn) *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== [https://www.4gon.co.uk/documents/airtight_ss300atc50_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AirTight Networks SS-300-AT-C-50 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:AirTight Networks SS-300-AT-C-50 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
